DOC.HEADLINE: GONZALEZ HAS STRAINED LIGAMENT
DOC.TEXT: Tony Gonzalez , the two-sport star from Huntington Beach who was injured in the first_quarter of the 35th Orange County North-South all-star football game Friday night , has a strained anterior cruciate ligament . Gonzalez , who is headed to California to play basketball and football , was expected to start football practice with the rest of the Cal freshmen Aug . 6 , but instead will probably wait until the middle or late August to begin practice .
